\begin{question}
Which, if any, of the following names are invalid?
\begin{itemize}
^^I\item \verb|int double = 3.14;|
^^I\item \verb|int _;|
^^I\item \verb|int catch-22;|
^^I\item \verb|int 1_or_2 = 1;|
^^I\item \verb|double Double = 3.14;|
\end{itemize}
\end{question}
